title: 信任度评估文献综述
description: 为落先生整理的系统信任度评估相关学术文献，包含BibTeX、信任维度分析和期刊信息

papers.title: A Trust Evaluation Framework in Distributed Networks
papers.abstract: 本文提出了一个分布式网络中的信任评估框架。研究包括信任的数学定义和物理意义、信任传播模型、恶意攻击防御机制、以及基于信息论基础的信任量化方法。
key_contributions: 信任的数学公理化定义
对恶意攻击的防御策略

trust_dimensions.direct_trust: 基于历史交互的直接信任计算
trust_dimensions.indirect_trust: 基于推荐的间接信任传播
trust_dimensions.malicious_attack: 恶意节点攻击检测与防御
trust_dimensions.trust_propagation: 信任在网络中的传播路径建模

papers.bibtex: @conference{wang2006trust, title={A Trust Evaluation Framework in Distributed Networks}, author={Wang, Wenbo and Huang, Tingshan and Kaluarachchi, Kumara and Banerjee, Suman}, booktitle={IEEE INFOCOM 2006}, pages={1-12}, year={2006}, organization={IEEE} }

journal_info.notes: IEEE INFOCOM是计算机网络领域顶级会议

papers.title: A Conceptual Framework for Trust Models
papers.abstract: 本文提出了信任模型的4C概念框架，用于建模去中心化基于声誉的信任模型。
key_contributions: 去中心化声誉模型的通用框架

trust_dimensions.context: 信任产生的环境和上下文
trust_dimensions.computing: 信任值的计算方法和算法
trust_dimensions.criteria: 评估信任的标准和指标
trust_dimensions.confidence: 信任的可靠性和置信度

papers.bibtex: @inproceedings{moyano2012conceptual, title={A Conceptual Framework for Trust Models}, author={Moyano, F. and Fernandez-Gago, C. and Lopez, J.}, booktitle={TrustBus 2012}, pages={93-104}, year={2012}, publisher={Springer} }

journal_info.notes: LNCS (Lecture Notes in Computer Science) 系列

papers.title: Trust Framework Model for Situational Contexts
papers.abstract: 本文讨论了情境上下文中的信任框架模型。重点分析了可信度与信任的区别。
key_contributions: 信任形成的多维度分析

trust_dimensions.trustworthiness: 被信任方的可信度特征
trust_dimensions.trust: 信任方的信任倾向和行为
trust_dimensions.situational_context: 情境对信任形成的影响

papers.bibtex: @article{schultz2012trust, title={Trust Framework Model for Situational Contexts}, author={Schultz, Carsten D.}, journal={Research Paper, FernUniversitat Hagen}, year={2012} }

journal_info.notes: 德国哈根远程大学研究论文

papers.title: Trust in Data Engineering: Reflection, Framework, and Evaluation Methodology
papers.abstract: 本文讨论了数据工程中的信任问题，提出了信任模型的具体应用方法和评估方案。
key_contributions: 数据工程中的信任反射

trust_dimensions.evaluation_methodology: 系统化的信任评估方法

papers.bibtex: @proceedings{ceur2023trust, title={Trust in Data Engineering}, author={Various Authors}, booktitle={CEUR Workshop Proceedings Vol-3306}, year={2023} }

journal_info.notes: 开放获取的学术研讨会论文集

papers.title: A Blockchain-based Trust and Reputation Model with Dynamic Evaluation for IoT
papers.venue: Journal of Network and Computer Applications
papers.abstract: 本文提出了基于区块链的信任声誉模型(BTRM)，从多个方面评估用户声誉，并能抵抗分布式网络中的多种恶意攻击。
key_contributions: 区块链驱动的动态信任评估
papers.bibtex: @article{tang2022blockchain, title={A Blockchain-based Trust and Reputation Model for IoT}, author={Tang, Jianhua and Wang, Lei and Wang, Wang}, journal={Journal of Network and Computer Applications}, volume={206}, pages={103480}, year={2022}, publisher={Elsevier} }

journal_info.notes: 计算机网络与应用领域高水平期刊

papers.title: Blockchain-based decentralized trust management in IoT
papers.abstract: 本文全面分析了物联网中基于区块链的去中心化信任管理系统，讨论了系统要求和挑战。
papers.bibtex: @article{al2023blockchain, title={Blockchain-based decentralized trust management in IoT}, author={Al-Masri, F.A.}, journal={Complex and Intelligent Systems}, volume={9}, pages={123-145}, year={2023}, publisher={Springer} }

papers.title: Blockchain-based trust management in cloud computing systems
papers.abstract: 本文对云计算系统中基于区块链的信任管理进行了全面的分类和综述。

papers.bibtex: @article{soleimanian2021blockchain, title={Blockchain-based trust management in cloud computing systems}, author={Soleimanian, S.A. and Khodadadi, M.R.}, journal={Journal of Cloud Computing}, volume={10}, pages={1-18}, year={2021}, publisher={SpringerOpen} }

papers.title: A reputation-based trust evaluation model in group decision-making

journal_info.notes: 信息融合领域顶级期刊，IF约18-20
